    • Constructor Detail

      • KitManager

        public KitManager(int id,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String permission,
                  double price,
                  int requiredWins,
                  ItemBuilder icon)
        Initialize a new Kit !
        Parameters:
        id - Unique ID of this Kit. Default kits : 0-9.
        name - Name of this Kit.
        description - Description of this Kit.
        permission - Permission needed to use this Kit.
        price - Price of this Kit.
        requiredWins - Required wins to use this Kit.
        icon - Icon of this Kit.

      • onEquip

        public abstract boolean onEquip(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Triggered when the game begins.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who chose this kit.
        Returns:
        true if you want to let the plugin equiping all the default things to the player (leather armor, sword, bow, etc.). false if you want to set a special inventory content to the player.
